_comment: This is the English translation file. Path: src/messages/en.json

hero.title: Discover Breakthrough Ideas at FPTU Hackathon
hero.subtitle: Join FPTU students on a journey of creativity and innovation.

services.sectionDescription: A platform for managing hackathon competitions exclusively for FPTU students.

hackathon.noHackathonsFound: No hackathons found. Try adjusting your filters.
hackathon.failedToLoad: Failed to load hackathons. Please try again later.
hackathon.errorFetchingHackathons: Error fetching hackathons. Please try again.
hackathon.teamMemberOnly: Only team members can enroll in hackathons
hackathon.dataLoadError: Failed to load hackathon data. Please try again later.
hackathon.dataUpdateSuccess: Mentorship data has been successfully updated
hackathon.dataUpdateError: Failed to update mentorship data. Please try again later.

hackathonDetail.noHackathonFound: No hackathon found with this ID

individualRegistration.clickToRegister: Click the button above to register as an individual.
individualRegistration.warningExistingRegistration: You already have an individual registration with status: {status}
individualRegistration.warningExistingTeamRequest: You already have a team request with status: {status}
individualRegistration.errorAlreadyRegisteredIndividual: You already have an individual registration for this hackathon with status: {status}.
individualRegistration.errorAlreadyTeamRequest: You already have a team request for this hackathon with status: {status}. Please cancel it first to register as an individual.
individualRegistration.registrationSuccess: Your individual registration has been submitted successfully.
individualRegistration.registrationError: Failed to create individual registration. Please try again.
individualRegistration.registrationErrorUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred while creating your registration.
individualRegistration.deletionErrorNonPending: You can only delete registrations with PENDING status. Current status: {status}
individualRegistration.registrationDeleted: Your individual registration has been deleted successfully.
individualRegistration.deletionError: Failed to delete individual registration. Please try again.

locations.title: Manage locations
locations.name: Name
locations.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this location?

judgeManagement.noJudgesAvailable: No judges available. Please add judges to the hackathon first.
judgeManagement.noRoundsFound: No rounds found for this hackathon yet.
judgeManagement.noRoundsCreated: No rounds have been created for this hackathon.
judgeManagement.judgeRemoved: Judge has been successfully removed from the round.
judgeManagement.judgeRemoveError: Failed to remove judge from round.
judgeManagement.judgeAssigned: Judge has been successfully assigned to the round.
judgeManagement.judgeAssignError: Failed to assign judge to round.
judgeManagement.dataFetchError: Failed to load rounds and judges data. Please try again later.

judgeAssign.descriptionTooltip: Additional information about this team's participation in the round
judgeAssign.noJudgesAvailable: No judges available for this round
judgeAssign.judgeRemoved: Judge has been successfully removed from the team
judgeAssign.judgeAssigned: Judge has been successfully assigned to the team
judgeAssign.failedToRemoveJudge: Could not remove the judge. Please try again later
judgeAssign.failedToAssignJudge: Could not assign judge to the team. Please try again later
judgeAssign.teamRoundStatusDescription: Describes the current state of this team in the round. Disqualified teams cannot be assigned judges
judgeAssign.failedToLoadHackathon: Failed to load hackathon data. Please try again later
